sentences.en: A file containing object code. The output of a compiler or assembler.
sentences.cn: 包含目标代码的文件. 编译器或汇编器的输出.

sentences.en: An assembler language programmer writes one mnemonic instruction for each machine - level instruction.
sentences.cn: 汇编语言程序设计员为每条机器指令写一条助记符指令.

sentences.en: An assembler operation of conditional assembly and macro generation.
sentences.cn: 对条件汇编及宏生成的一种汇编操作.

sentences.en: An expression that an assembler evaluates at pre - assembly time.
sentences.cn: 汇编程序在预汇编时对其求值的一种表达式.

sentences.en: Assembler - A female track star who holds all the world speed records.
sentences.cn: 汇编 —— 一位田径运动明星,她拥有速度上的世界纪录.

sentences.en: AVR Assembler 2 compiler source code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: AVR单片机汇编2编译器的源代码完整, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: In assembler programming, a name entry.
sentences.cn: 汇编程序设计中使用的一种名(字)项.

sentences.en: In this example, the assembler template consists of assembly instructions.
sentences.cn: 本例中，汇编程序模板由汇编指令组成。

sentences.en: It is highly recommended you get NASM assembler too.
sentences.cn: 高度推荐您也安装NASM汇编程序.

sentences.en: Nice assembler for 8051 source code integrity, and can be used directly.
sentences.cn: 尼斯汇编8051源代码完整, 并可以直接使用.

sentences.en: Section VI will show the complete solution in Assembler.
sentences.cn: 第VI部分将给出完全的汇编解决方案.

sentences.en: The action taken by the assembler when it replaces a variable symbol with a value , for example , during the expansion of a macro definition.
sentences.cn: 汇编程序采用的一种动作，例如在宏定义展开时，它用一个值来代替一个变量符号。

sentences.en: The assembler language is a kind of symbolic language.
sentences.cn: 汇编语言是一种符号语言.

sentences.en: The design of traffic lights with assembler language feel pretty good!
sentences.cn: 交通灯的设计用汇编语言自己觉得挺不错的!

sentences.en: There are usually no nested statements, blocks , and so forth in assembler statements.
sentences.cn: 在这些汇编语句中通常不包含嵌套语句, 分程序等等.

sentences.en: This software logic can be written in a higher level programming language, or it can be executed as assembler logic on a computer chip.
sentences.cn: 这里的软件逻辑可以使用较为高级的编程语言编写，可作为汇编程序逻辑在计算机芯片上执行。

sentences.en: This way, if you need to add a register to your code later, the assembler will auto-recalculate the new register numbers and you don't have to alter your register numbering convention.
sentences.cn: 这样，如果您以后需要向代码中添加一个寄存器，那么汇编程序就会自动重新计算新寄存器的编号，您也不必更改自己的寄存器编号约定。

sentences.en: Utilizing an assembler to produce a machine - language program.
sentences.cn: 用汇编程序产生机器语言的过程.

sentences.en: VC ++ is used to call the assembly compiler to compile the assembler.
sentences.cn: 并给出了利用VC+调用汇编编译器编译汇编源文件的方法.

sentences.en: What's the difference between an assembler and compiler?
sentences.cn: 汇编程序和编译程序之间有何判别呢？

words.tran_cn: 装配；集合；聚集；集会；集合物；聚集的物或人
[计]汇编程序；汇编机；[机]装配工

trans.tran_cn: 装配工，汇编程序，低级编码， 汇编语言
trans.tran_en: An assembler is a person, a machine, or a company that assembles the individual parts of a vehicle or a piece of equipment such as a computer
